BERT - pair.from sentence: We find that BERT - single has achieved better results on these two subtasks , and BERT - pair has achieved further improvements over BERT - single .

BERT - pair - NLI - B model.from sentence: The BERT - pair - NLI - B model achieves the best performance for aspect category detection .
